metadata.synopsis: A Bhaal Reaper in the Temple of Bhaal.

0.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Snirr
0.text: Orin taught us some very specific cruelties. Speak the word, Chosen, and I will inflict them on anyone you wish.
0.context: NodeContext: Commanding, someone who holds authority (even though the player outranks them)

1.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Snirr
1.text: Orin taught us some very specific cruelties. Betray the Chosen's trust, and I will inflict them upon you without hesitation.
1.context: NodeContext: Commanding, someone who holds authority (even though the player outranks them)

2.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Snirr
2.text: Orin taught us some very specific cruelties. Were you not Bhaal's spawn, I would inflict them upon you, traitor.
2.context: NodeContext: Commanding, someone who holds authority (even though the player outranks them)

3.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Snirr
3.text: Lady Orin has been waiting for you... We all have.

4.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Snirr
4.text: I am sure you have cruelties of your own to teach us, Bhaalspawn. For that... I cannot wait.
4.context: NodeContext: bhaalspawn said with utter reverence

5.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Snirr
5.text: Step aside, bastard child. Another Chosen will fill your place soon enough.
5.context: NodeContext: bhaalspawn said with utter reverence

6.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Snirr
6.text: To rebuke the Lord of Murder... You travel with a fool, a wastrel.
6.context: NodeContext: Commanding, someone who holds authority (even though the player outranks them)
